Thanks to you, the ACLU's impact in Vermont is growing.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

As our centennial anniversary approaches, the ACLU's impact in Vermont and across the country is growing. That's why I'm excited to share our summer newsletter with you.

Inside the newsletter you'll get a snapshot of how we've advanced Vermonters' civil liberties these past six months. That includes fighting to ensure hundreds of Vermont prisoners have access to lifesaving medical treatment, continuing in our steadfast defense of immigrants' rights, and safeguarding Vermonters' reproductive freedom.

Read Report

We also provide an update on our Smart Justice Vermont campaign, which aims to transform Vermont's criminal justice system by investing in people, not prisons.

Heading into our 100th year, this work is more vital than ever. Thank you for all you do to sustain the ACLU in the Green Mountain State and across the country. Please continue to support our work. We could not do this without you.

Thanks for sticking with us,

James Lyall
Executive Director, ACLU of Vermont

P.S. We hope to see you on Saturday, September 28 for our 52nd annual meeting in Montpelier! RSVP today.
